page.title: 15PAT SEED
page.content: Pat was born in Pendleton,Salford on St.Patrick's day 1928.She went to Pendleton Junior School and enjoyed all subjects.An only child she was very chatty and loved caring for animals.Mrs Howard,Pat's mother,wanted her to be a teacher but Pat chose journalism, working for the Manchester Guardian.Pat enjoyed life and loved a joke.She always had lots to say and was a very interesting person.After moving to Garstang in 1949 she married Geoffrey Seed. In 1976 Pat became ill and in 1977 was moved to Christie's Hospital,Manchester suffering from cancer.Told she had just 6 months to live Pat was upset,not for herself,but for the children who were suffering from cancer.Christie's needed a scanner to diagnose cancer.Pat decided to help.
